Choose a friendly unit and a spell. Counter that spell and give that unit +[S] equal to that spell's Energy cost this turn.
When you conquer here, you may pay [1] and return a unit you control here to its owner's hand. If you do, play a 2 [S] Sand Soldier unit token here.
While you control this battlefield, friendly legends have "[T]: Attach an Equipment you control to a unit you control."
Players can't score here until their third turn.
When you conquer here, you may pay [1] to ready your legend.
While you control this battlefield, friendly [Repeat] costs cost [1] less.
When you conquer here, put the top 2 cards of your Main Deck into your trash.
While you control this battlefield, the first friendly non-token gear played each turn costs [1] less.
When you hold here, you may pay \[A]\[A]\[A]\[A] to score 1 point.
When you defend here, reveal the top card of your Main Deck. If it's a spell, put it in your hand. Otherwise, recycle it.
Units can't be played here.
When you conquer here, draw 1 for each other battlefield you or allies control.
When you conquer here with one or more [Mighty] units, you may pay [1] to draw 1.  (A unit is Mighty while it has 5+ [S].)
When you hold here, each player channels 1 rune exhausted.
When you conquer here, you may pay [1] to play a Gold gear token exhausted.
When you conquer here, you may ready a friendly gear. If it's an Equipment, you may detach it.

When you attach an Equipment to me, choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn —
- Ready 2 runes.
- Channel 1 rune exhausted.
- Buff a friendly unit.

[Deflect]  (Opponents must pay [A] to choose me with a spell or ability.) 
When you choose or ready me, give me +1 [S] this turn.

I must be assigned combat damage last.
If another unit you control here would die, if it has less Might than me, instead heal it, exhaust it, and recall it.  (Send it to base. This isn't a move.)
Your Mechs have [Shield].  (+1 [S] while they're defenders.)

[Hidden] (Hide now for 1 rune of any type to react with later for 0 energy.)
When I defend or I'm played from [Hidden], reveal the top 5 cards of your Main Deck. Deal 1 to an enemy unit here for each card with [Hidden], then recycle them.

When an enemy unit attacks a battlefield you control, give it -1 might this turn, to a minimum of 1 might.
